subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: With his plans for the next America’s Cup scuppered by losing in court, Alinghi’s president, Ernesto Bertarelli, has expressed interest in making radical changes to the world’s oldest major sporting event.
snippet: With his plans for the next America’s Cup scuppered by losing in court, Alinghi’s president, Ernesto Bertarelli, has expressed interest in making radical changes to the world’s oldest major sporting event.
